extension.summary: Chains Wizard is a lightweight template for installing builds on Kodi. Has some code from Aftermath Wizard by Surfacingx. Skin Switch by OpenELEQ. Base code by BYB. Credits to them and all others who contributed. Please report any bugs to @slamious on Telegram/Twitter.
extension.news: 3.0.0 - Added backup/restore functionality for trakt/debrid accounts. Updated debrid/trakt authorization section. Restore of gui/skin settings has been added. Updated Advancedsettings configs. Updated wizard artwork. Added user edited color options for menus. Fixed wizard writing over itself during build installs. Edited fresh start to keep wizard/dependencies. Removed double ok dialog during build installs. Numerous other small fixes throughout.
